project_abstract.cdata: The Industrial Development Project will finance: (a) investment of private enterprises to improve international competitiveness and/or expand exports; (b) exports by providing partial to full coverage of exporters' pre-shipment finance needs for imported inputs; and (c) technical assistance to help in designing and implementing policies and strategies for privatization and restructuring, and for strengthening institutional capacity of the individual participating financial institution.
